name: tech-tutorials
description: This Tutorials application provides a platform for users to browse, enroll in, and manage tutorial courses. It's built using Express.js with MongoDB, and supports various view engines such as Handlebars, EJS, and Pug. Guests can view the homepage, register, and log in, while logged-in users can interact with more in-depth functionalities like enrolling in courses or managing courses they've created.
